price: ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߕߐ߮ ߓߘߊ߫ ߟߊߜߍ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߞߟߊ߬ߒ߬ߞߋ߬ߦߊ ߕߌ߱ ߣߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ߡߙߊ߬ߒ߬ߞߋ߬ߦߊ ߕߌ߱ ߘߌ߫
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
